user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: This screenshot displays a shopping cart on Amazon, showing a subtotal of $1,224.97 for four items. The items include a 2017 Apple MacBook Air priced at $390.00 and a Logitech G933 Artemis Spectrum headset for $139.99. There are options to adjust the quantity, delete items, or save them for later. The user can proceed to checkout or choose to send the items as a gift.
